articles.author: Linda E. Grimm, Johnson Space Center Office of Communications
articles.title: The Overview Effect: Astronaut Perspectives from 25 Years in Low Earth Orbit - NASA (.gov)
articles.description: To see Earth from space is to be forever changed by the view. Since Alan Shepard became the first American to lay eyes on our home planet from above,
articles.content: To see Earth from space is to be forever changed by the view. Since Alan Shepard became the first American to lay eyes on our home planet from above, countless NASA astronauts have described feeling … [+3983 chars]
